title: How the Hangman Lost His Heart
description: What's a nice girl like Alice doing with a hangman called Dan Skinslicer?He likes a good clean killing and a hearty supper afterwards.She likes pretty dresses and riding a well-bred horse.But fate throws them together on a mission of mercy--to save Alice's poor uncle Frank's head and restore his dignity.Soon they find themselves on the run from every soldier in London.It could be their necks next!
author: K.M. Grant
